title: Social Democratic and Labour Party
summary: The Social Democratic and Labour Party (SDLP) (Irish: Páirtí Sóisialta Daonlathach an Lucht Oibre)[9] is a social-democratic[5][10][11] and Irish nationalist[10][12][13] political party in Northern Ireland. The SDLP currently has 12 MLAs in the Northern Ireland Assembly and two Members of Parliament (MPs) in the House of the Commons of the United Kingdom.
